text.div:
OrderSetItemSelectionBehavior

Defines selection behavior of a group

This value set has an inline code system http://hl7.org/fhir/selection-behavior, which defines the following codes:

CodeDisplayDefinition
any AnyAny number of the items in the group may be chosen, from zero to all
all AllAll the items in the group must be selected as a single unit
all-or-none All Or NoneAll the items in the group are meant to be chosen as a single unit: either all must be selected by the end user, or none may be selected
exactly-one Exactly OneThe end user must choose one and only one of the selectable items in the group. The user may not choose none of the items in the group
at-most-one At Most OneThe end user may choose zero or at most one of the items in the group
one-or-more One Or MoreThe end user must choose a minimum of one, and as many additional as desired

name: OrderSetItemSelectionBehavior
description: Defines selection behavior of a group

concept.definition: Any number of the items in the group may be chosen, from zero to all
All the items in the group must be selected as a single unit
All the items in the group are meant to be chosen as a single unit: either all must be selected by the end user, or none may be selected
The end user must choose one and only one of the selectable items in the group. The user may not choose none of the items in the group
The end user may choose zero or at most one of the items in the group
The end user must choose a minimum of one, and as many additional as desired
